TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ProfileAuthenticationOption extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Describes the authentication type of user profiles to be searched.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption> enumeration is used by profile providers and the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager> class when they search for profiles in the data source and when they delete them. The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption> enumeration is used to select whether only anonymous, only authenticated, or all profiles are searched.
## Examples The following code example allows a user to view and delete active and inactive profiles information based on search criteria including a <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption> parameter.
> [!IMPORTANT] > This example includes a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption All = int32(2)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption Anonymous = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption Authenticated = int32(1)
